name: Easy Spaghetti
description: This Easy Spaghetti Recipe is ready in just 15 minutes and is a hearty, comforting meal during cooler months. Pair with a side salad or steamed veggies for a full meal and enjoy! - Averie Sunshine

name: Easy Homemade Mac and Cheese
description: This Easy Homemade Mac and Cheese Recipe is made with 6 ingredients in 15 minutes on the stovetop (no baking required)! Time to ditch the boxed mac and cheese for this irresistibly creamy, smooth & cheesy homemade recipe! - Laura

name: Simple Tomato Soup
description: This easy tomato soup is my go-to recipe. It's simple and delicious, ready in 30 minutes, and I give leftovers to my kids for lunch. I usually serve it with rosemary bread for dunking. - Barbara Sauermann

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Take the time to make Chicken Noodle Soup from scratch and you'll never be able to make it another way again! My mom's version is a step above the rest, made with homemade stock and egg noodles that take just minutes to make. - Lauren Allen

name: Easy Gluten-Free Broccoli Cheese Soup
description: Craving comfort food? Our Gluten-Free Broccoli Cheese Soup recipe is calling your name! Thick, creamy, cheesy, and delicious. - Emily Dixon, One Lovely Life

name: French Toast
description: This classic French toast recipe is an easy, delicious breakfast. I love it with fresh fruit and maple syrup on top! - Jeanine and Jack

name: Fried Egg Sandwich
description: This fried egg sandwich makes great comfort food! You can use any type of bread or cheese that you want for this quick and easy breakfast. Serve with fruit and juice and/or milk for a full breakfast. - Erica

name: Crispy Hash Browns
description: The secret to the crispiest hash browns? Remove as much moisture as possible before frying. Here's how. - Elise Bauer

name: Mamaw's Chicken and Rice Casserole
description: I grew up with this chicken and rice casserole recipe. My Grandmother got it from a lady from church at a potluck a long time ago! She passed it down to my mom and it's always been a family favorite. Quick and easy for school nights, and the leftovers are just as good! - katiefbenham

name: Sloppy Joes
description: These crowd-pleasing Sloppy Joe sandwiches will take you back to your childhood! This is my mom's recipe and it always gets compliments! - Tamara

name: Easy Chicken Fajitas
description: These Easy Chicken Fajitas are the perfect weeknight meal because they’re on the table in about 20 minutes start to finish! - Holly Nilsson

name: Easy Ground Beef Tacos
description: These Ground Beef Tacos are filled with juicy flavorful taco meat made with my homemade taco seasoning - it's an easy weeknight recipe for the whole family! - Yumna Jawad

name: Easy Black Bean Soup
description: A simple and healthy soup made with canned black beans and ingredients you probably already have in your pantry! This flavorful black bean soup is vegan, gluten-free, and vegetarian. - Maria Lichty

name: Easy Chicken Stir Fry Recipe
description: This easy Chicken Stir Fry recipe is loaded with fresh veggies and the most delicious sauce made with honey, soy sauce, and toasted sesame oil! This healthy recipe takes 20 minutes to make and will wow your family with it’s amazing flavor! - Trish

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Stuffed Bell Peppers have been a huge favorite of mine since my aunt first made them for me many many years ago. At the time it seemed like such an elaborate, fancy recipe, but who knew they were really this simple to make! It’s a classic comfort food recipe that’s hearty, filling, easy to customize, and can feed a large family. - Marsha McDougal

name: Vegetable Soup
description: This Vegetable Soup has become one of my most popular soup recipes and for good reason! It's healthy, it's comforting and 1,000 times better than what you'll get in a can! Makes 15 cups. - Jaclyn

name: Chicken Quesadillas
description: This really is the best chicken quesadillas recipe! So easy, these fajita-style quesadillas taste just as good, if not better, than any restaurant! - Mel

name: Chicken Pot Pie
description: This traditional Chicken Pot Pie recipe is easy to make, with a buttery, flaky pie crust and creamy chicken and vegetable filling. - Lauren Allen

name: Fried Rice
description: Learn how to make fried rice with this classic recipe. It only takes 15 minutes to make, it’s easy to customize with your favorite add-ins, and it’s SO flavorful and delicious! - Ali

name: Vegetable Omelette
description: With just 5 minutes of prep and a good pan, this easy recipe will teach you how to make a vegetable omelette. So grab an onion, pepper, mushrooms, and cheddar cheese, and let's cook breakfast! - Sarah Bond

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Learn how to make the best Grilled Cheese sandwich with a crisp, buttery exterior and gooey cheese center. It's perfect for dipping into warm tomato soup. - Natasha Kravchuk

name: Easy Egg Fried Rice
description: This egg fried rice is quick to make with instant rice. It's easy to customize with other vegetables or leftover roast meat. - Krista B

name: Vegetable Quesadillas
description: My easy vegetable quesadilla recipe combines delicious spiced veggies and gooey cheese. Our easy spice mixture makes these taste amazing. Use whatever vegetable you have on hand! - Adam & Joanne

name: Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: These are THE BEST soft chocolate chip cookies! No chilling required. Just ultra thick, soft, classic chocolate chip cookies! - Lindsay (Editor's Note: Can confirm, these are delicious!)

name: Strawberry Crisp
description: This Fresh Strawberry Crisp is the best summer dessert ever! Fresh juicy strawberries are topped with a buttery and crumbly oat topping, and is absolutely swoothworthy with a big scoop of vanilla ice cream on top! - Ashlyn

name: Instant Pot Loaded Potato Soup
description: This Instant Pot Loaded Potato Soup is creamy, delicious, and tastes like you slaved over it all day! It’s easy to prepare and is ready in a flash thanks to the Instant Pot. There’s also a slow cooker version if you’d rather prepare it that way! - Ashlyn
